alert.note: Alert for Newton; Rockdale; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:46PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Rockdale, central Walton and northern Newton Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1246 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Conyers, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Conyers, Monroe, Covington, Loganville, Social Circle, Oxford, Walnut Grove, Between, Jersey, Lakeview Estates, Georgia International Horse Park, Almon, Nicholasville, Milstead, Youth, Big Haynes Creek Park, Campton, Gratis, and Gum Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
